name: Peter's Hole
description:
🕳 a k-hole simulator. based on true events.. maybe? jump into the (w)hole, peter! 🕳 Some textures somehow don't work in the Web build (above 👆) so please download for the real experience!

My first ever game project 😮😶

  • PRICE: FREE 💕😘
  • PLATFORMS: Windows 7+, Mac OS X 10.8+
  • SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS: a computer with 2+ GB RAM and a DX9 / SM3.0 compatible graphics card... if your system was manufactured within the last 2-3 years, it's probably OK
  • CONTROLS: Keyboard arrows, Space to jump and mouse or trackpad
  • RUNTIME: 4 minutes and 49 seconds (digital k-holes are apparently shorter then real life ones 😉)
  • MUSIC: Earth Jungle by Menishu (yepp, that's also me hehe)
